metadata.description: Akira Itou, who is the manga artist of Yu-Gi-Oh R and Cardfight!! Vangurd, draws a new comic which is called Enchant Race. Retra and Turbo, who are the main characters, live on a planet and end up becoming car racers due to a twist of fate. They need a monster to participate in the car race on this planet. The manga is intended for people ranging from children to adults. It's a mech action adventure manga.
metadata.name: Enchanted Racer
